explains: n. 阴谋者；反叛者；同谋者

sentences.en: His co-conspirator in England was a male nurse named Dale Bolinger.
sentences.cn: 他在英国的同谋是一位名叫戴尔·博林格的男护士。

sentences.en: It is the face of a conspirator.
Kim tells Nina that Rick wasn't really a conspirator in the kidnapping.
sentences.cn: 金姆告诉尼娜，里克并不能真正算是绑架的同谋。
